message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $15000. Given its unique features and benefits, we propose an exclusive offer of $20000 for this exceptional product. We understand that the true value lies in meeting your requirements perfectly, and we are confident that our product surpasses all expectations. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way we can make this offer more appealing to you.
